column2: "EWURADZE n'asɛm a ɔnam Malaki do baa Israel hɔ nye iyi."

column3: EWURADZE na ɔse. Naaso hom ka dɛ
column4: Ebɛnadze mu na adɔ hɛn? Ana nnyɛ Jakob no nua nye Esau? EWURADZE na ɔse: naaso modɔɔ Jakob;"

column3: na memaa ne mbepɔw yɛɛ afo
column4: na medze n'egyapadze maa sar do mpataku."
naaso yɛbɛsan akɛkyekyer mbeambea a ayeyɛ afoafo no a; mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE so se nye yi
column6: na emi so mubodwuruw egu famu: kɛpem dɛ adasa bɛfrɛ hɔn dɛ
column8: na Ɔman a EWURADZE afa hɔn ho ebufuw daapem."

column4: EWURADZE yɛ Okokroko mpo tra Israel ahe do."

column3: na akowaa dzi no wura nyi: sɛ egya nye me a
column4: nna m'enyidzii wɔ hen? Na sɛ owura nye me a
column5: mo ho suro wɔ hen? Dɔm EWURADZE na ɔka kyerɛ hom asɔfo a wobu me dzin enyimtsia no. Na hom bisa dɛ
column6: Ebɛn mu na yebu wo dzin enyimtsia?"

column2: "Hom dze paanoo a no ho ekum brɛ me wɔ m'afɔrmbukyia do. Na hom bisa dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze mu na yeegu wo ho fi? Wɔ dɛ hom ka dɛ
column4: EWURADZE n'edzidzipon no woebu no enyimtsia."

column2: "Na sɛ hom dze abowa nyitɔr ba bɔbɔ afɔr a
column3: ɔnnyɛ bɔn bi! Na sɛ hom dze mbowa mpakye na ayarfo ba bɔbɔ afɔr a
column4: ɔnnyɛ bɔn bi! Afei dze fa kɛma w'ambrado; dɛ n'enyi bɔsɔ wo a? Anaaso mpo dɛ ɔbɔhwɛ w'enyim a? Dɔm EWURADZE na ɔse."
ma ɔmbɔdom hɛn ɛ: na sɛ hom nsamu na iyi fi a
column5: aso ɔbɔhwɛ hom mu obiara enyim? Dɔm EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Kɛtseankyɛ obi wɔ hom mu a ɔbɔtotow mbobow no mu
column3: amma hom aannsɔ m'afɔrmbukyia do ogya kwa! M'enyi nnsɔ hom hwee
column5: eso merenngye hom nsamu ayɛyɛdze biara."

column2: "Na ofitsi wipuei dze kesi no tɔree mpo
column3: me dzin yɛ kɛse wɔ Amanaman mu; na wɔhyew eduhuam bɔ afɔr ma me dzin wɔ mbeambea nyina
column4: na wɔdze ayɛyɛdze a no ho tsew ba: na me dzin yɛ kɛse wɔ Amanaman mu
ɔhaw bɛn nye yi! Na hom tweetwee gu do
column5: dɔm EWURADZE na ɔse; na afei so hom dze dza wɔdze enyimpi fae
column6: na mbowa mpakye na ayarfo no ba; dɛm na hom dze hom ayɛyɛdze ba. Aso mebɛgye iyi wɔ hom nsamu? EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Na ndom nka nyia ɔwɔ onyin wɔ no nguankuw mu
column4: naaso osisi na ɔdze dza odzi dzɛm bɔ EWURADZE okum afɔr no: na ɔhen kɛse nye me
column6: na me dzin yɛ hu wɔ Amanaman mu."
